description:
The battle of Crimson Twinewing vs. Fiddler Crab reaches its climax, and Sunraku decides what to do next.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Lion déchaîné contre lapin, crabe virtuose de la roulette à pizza
Shishi wa Usagi ni Zenryoku o, Kani wa Fushichou ni Pizza Cutter
The Lion Catches a Rabbit with Its Full Strength; the Crab Catches a Phoenix with a Pizza Cutter
獅子は兎に全力を, 蟹は不死鳥にピザカッター
